snippet: Hopes for Malaysia's first gold medal in the Olympics were dashed on Sunday, disappointing the Malaysian immigrants who gathered in Queens to watch the tense gold-medal match in men's badminton in London.
abstract: Hopes for Malaysia's first gold medal in the Olympics were dashed on Sunday, disappointing the Malaysian immigrants who gathered in Queens to watch the tense gold-medal match in men's badminton in London.

headline.main: Silver Consolation Prize for Queens Badminton Club
headline.print_headline: Consolation Prize for a Queens Club
